VICTIM ADVOCATE
Professional Summary
Social worker with more that five years of experience as Multicultural Victim  Advocate and exceptional people skills.
Versed in advocacy and case management .
Desires a challenging role as HR Generalist.
Strategic planning and client relationship management expert.
Experience in counseling individuals of various
ethnic and socio-economic backgrounds, including Latinos and immigrants from various countries.
Core Qualifications
Case management Interpersonal skill Crisis intervention Client relations Databases Decision making Adaptable Self motivated Creative problem solving
Bilingual Translation and Interpretation (Spanish and English) Legal navigation
Public speaking Team player Computer proficient
File/records maintenance
Organizational skills
